meanings.definition: The quality or state of being roundheadednesses.
meanings.sent1: Her roundheadednesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The roundheadednesses of the ball made it perfect for rolling.
meanings.sent3: The roundheadednesses of the pumpkin made it look like a little orange planet.
meanings.sent4: His roundheadednesses in decision-making led to a well-rounded approach.
meanings.sent5: The roundheadednesses of the snowman's top part made it look cute and friendly.

meanings.definition: The roundheadednesses of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The cartoon character's roundheadednesses added to its charm.
meanings.sent2: The roundheadednesses of the statue gave it a classic look.
meanings.sent3: The roundheadednesses of the balloon made it float in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The roundheadednesses of the clock tower made it a landmark in the city.
meanings.sent5: The roundheadednesses of the teddy bear made it huggable and lovable.
